name: Zombie Shoot: Death City
description:
Battle with zombies to shoot them with this amazing zombie shooting game. Shoot your zombie target to kill them. If you are looking to play a game with dead zombies, just try this amazing zombie game with incredible game play.

Zombie Shoot: Death City , you can enjoy a completely different kind of Zombie game experience! The game includes amazing graphics and smooth game controls to enhance your game play experience

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D Graphics
- Different weapons
- Stunning graphics and visuals
- Different environment and locations
- Multiple zombie waves
- Smooth and easy controls
